task.title: Learning UPS Technologies
task.shortdesc: This training seminar will help you get accustomed to the technologies used in your new position at UPS.

context.p: The software TrainMeUPS is used for training new UPS employees.

step.cmd: In the top search bar, type in trainmeups.com.
Log in with the credentials your training coordinator provides you.
Choose your job position and follow the on-screen prompts.
step.info: If you encounter any problems, bring them to your training coordinator's attention.
